talk.abstract: OpenStack is a large python application being developed collaboratively with Rackspace, Red Hat, Canonical, Dell, HP, Intel, IBM, Citrix and a host of other companies. This application is the software that Cloud Computing is built on. It is a controller for massive farms of hypervisors. In this talk, you'll learn about the architecture and implementation of OpenStack.
talk.bio: Based in Halifax, Alex 'Sandy' Walsh is the owner of Dark Secret Software. He has been a senior professional developer for nearly 20 years and a Pythonista for 10 years. He is a core developer on the OpenStack project with Rackspace. You can learn more about him at sandywalsh.com or follow @TheSandyWalsh.

talk.name: Introduction to OpenStack
talk.title: Introduction to OpenStack
